product_name: The North Face Thunder Micro Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Thunder Micro jacket is a down-filled, technical classic that keeps you warm and happy while backcountry skiing and alpine climbing. Premium 800-fill-power goose down offers superior warmth and is highly compressible. Water-repellent down has been treated to keep moisture at bay. Slim down chambers capture and retain warmth more efficiently than wider chambers. Stretchy FlashDry(TM) panels under arms wick moisture and speed drying to keep you comfortable. Zippered handwarmer pockets are generous and easy to access. The North Face Thunder Micro jacket stuffs into its own handwarmer pocket.
short_description: The North Face Thunder Micro jacket is a down-filled, technical classic that keeps you warm and happy while backcountry skiing and alpine climbing.
